column2: 'Furious' Meghan McCain's Brutal Nickname For Trump Lights Up Twitter
column5: â€œThe Viewâ€ cohost Meghan McCain called out House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) and others within the GOP conference for failing to defend Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.). And in so doing she managed to get a biting nickname for former President Donald TrumpÂ to trend on Twitter: #CheetoJesus.Â  Cheney was among the 10 Republicans in the House who voted to impeach Trump earlier this year and has blamed him for the Jan. 6 insurrection in which Trump supporters attacked the U.S. Capitol in an attempt to block the certification of the 2020 election results.Â  Earlier this weekÂ McCarthy was caught on a hot mic saying he had â€œhad itâ€ with Cheney and was ready to dump her from House GOP leadership.Â  â€œIâ€™ve lost confidenceâ€ he said in audio obtained by Axios. â€œWell someone just has to bring a motion but I assume that will probably take place.â€ McCain said it wasnâ€™t really a hot mic moment at all. â€œWell letâ€™s cut the crap: He wasnâ€™t caught on a hot micâ€ she said. â€œI think anyone in politics knows that was done intentionally.â€ Then she summed up the situation: â€œWhatâ€™s happening is itâ€™s very clear and Iâ€™m gonna be a little crass theyâ€™re shivving her for her going on television multiple times and saying that the election wasnâ€™t stolen and for refusing to debase herself to Cheeto Jesus.â€Â  McCain complained that the message from McCarthy was that women who wonâ€™t â€œbend the kneeâ€ to Trump have no place in the party. â€œThe leadership in the party is doubling down that Trump is the futureâ€ she said adding that Republicans lose elections when they count on Trumpâ€™s leadership. Now they are further alienating voters such as college-educated women.Â  â€œItâ€™s the most asinine politics Iâ€™ve seen in a really really long time in a cacophony of asinine politicsâ€Â McCain said. She said that there would be consequences for punishing Cheney for her lack of fealty to Trump. â€œGo ahead in this sausagefest of MAGA up on Capitol Hill pull her out and put another woman in who will do and say anything you want for President Trumpâ€ McCain said.Â â€œSee where this lands us in midterms. Iâ€™m absolutely furious.â€ McCain is the daughter of the late Sen. John McCain (R-Ariz.). Trump often attacked her father even after his death in 2018. Trump also blasted her mother Cindy McCain after she crossed party lines to endorse Joe Biden for president last year.Â  McCainâ€™s segment caused the term #CheetoJesus to trend on Twitter on Wednesday:Â Â  #CheetoJesus is trending.
